title: Why You Trust the Internet More Than Your Doctor
author: DocBastard
description: Doctors were once the most trusted members of the community, but now it's the opposite. Why are we so desperate for our doctors to be wrong?
cleaned_text: I don't get it. I wish I could get paid for every time I've said that phrase when discussing complementary and alternative medicine...or women. With even a small stipend for each utterance I could have retired to a warm, sandy island by now. Doctors used to be among the highest-trusted professionals in the community, but now we're the enemy. A brief perusal online will show that we in the medical field are all in Big Pharma's pocket. Doctors aren't esteemed now, we're dangerous.
